name: 賴冠廷
objective:
在本課程中，學生將熟習應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：
（１）Linux作業系統
（２）雲端環境與架構(AWS, Azure, Firebase等等)
（３）Android程式設計

In this class, the students will learn how to develop software applications via hands-on labs. The topics include:
(1) Linux OS
(2) Cloud Computing Environments and Architecture (AWS, Azure, Firebase, etc.)
(3) Android Programming
schedule:
Lab 1: Linux Porgramming
Lab 2: Creating a Cloud server (AWS)
Lab 3: Android Hello World
Lab 4: Activity and Layout
Lab 5: Broadcasts
Lab 6: Stop watch
Lab 7: navbar
Lab 8: Google Map
Lab 9: sqlite
Lab 10: Camera APP
Lab 11: Firebase
